name: CSRF (Cross-Site Request Forgery)
description: Exploit CSRF vulnerability to perform unauthorized actions

solution.explanation: Exploit the CSRF vulnerability to perform an unauthorized action on behalf of an authenticated user.
steps: Navigate to /csrf and observe the transfer form
Notice there's no CSRF token validation
Create an HTML page with a malicious form that auto-submits
Trick an authenticated user into visiting your page
The transfer will execute without user consent
Capture the flag from the response
hints: CSRF attacks exploit the trust a website has in a user's browser
Look for state-changing operations without CSRF protection
The form submission doesn't validate the request origin
